timeline.bodyText: I think that by default we can store the template in the api/src/main/resources/templates/ folder and use classpath:templates/... url as default value for monitoring.stats.export.xls.template. In this case you do not need any additional file manipulations during build and deploy and you still can replace xls template with some external value setting CP_API_MONITORING_XLS_TEMPLATE_PATH env var
